name: simplicate1
short_description:
Steve Comrie is a web developer & web designer in Toronto, Canada with 15 years of experience planning, developing and marketing web projects for a large number of clients from a wide range of industries

------------------------------------

Simplicate Interactive has been a leading provider of custom web applications, content management solutions, and website development since 2010. Based in Toronto, Canada, Simplicate Interactive is managed by Steve Comrie and supported by an experienced team of designers, developers, writers and other web marketing specialists hand-selected for each project.
